Game.Name: Danny Sullivan's Indy Heat
Game.Plot: Danny Sullivan's Indy Heat is a 1991 arcade game by Leland Corporation featuring American Indy Car driver Danny Sullivan. It was licensed to Tradewest who commissioned Amiga, Atari ST, Commodore 64, NES and Sega Mega Drive ports for release in the following year. The Mega Drive version, despite reportedly being complete, did not get a release.
